response.original_title: Voices of the world the extinction of language and linguistic diversity
response.overview: Linguists investigate why some languages become global and others disappear and how language and identity are connected. They also discuss the state and fate of Livonian, Dogon, Mlabri, Changsha Hua, Naqxi, Pitjantjatjara, Pintupi, and Tutunaku
response.title: Voices of the world the extinction of language and linguistic diversity
